question: In the match between India and Pakistan at Jaipur on 02-10-1983, Which new rule was introduced?
option1: Limit of overs was reduced to 50 overs
option2: The rule of field restriction was taken.
option3: Over throw runs were batsman's score
option4: No-balls & wides were debited to bowlers analysis
answer: No-balls & wides were debited to bowlers analysis
explanation: Before this match, no balls & wides were debited in extras.
